name: .IGT File Extension
summary: Learn about .IGT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Diagram template created by iGrafx, a business diagramming application; saves a diagram that can be used for creating iGrafx documents (.IGX files) from the same starting point and with a similar appearance.

content: Several iGrafx templates are included with the software installation. When you create a new diagram, the software loads the appropriate starting template for the selected diagram type.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
